metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: This Section applies to garages and carports serving dwelling units
requirements.exact_quote: This Section applies to garages and carports serving dwelling units

requirements.description: An attached garage is a garage that shares a common wall or ceiling with a dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: An attached garage is a garage that shares a common wall or ceiling with a dwelling unit

requirements.description: A detached garage is a garage that is structurally separate from a dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: A detached garage is a garage that is structurally separate from a dwelling unit

requirements.description: Garage floors shall be constructed of concrete or other noncombustible material
requirements.exact_quote: Garage floors shall be constructed of concrete or other noncombustible material

requirements.description: Garage floors shall be sloped to drain towards the garage door or a floor drain
requirements.exact_quote: Garage floors shall be sloped to drain towards the garage door or a floor drain

requirements.description: Garage floor shall be not less than 100 mm below adjacent dwelling unit floor level
requirements.exact_quote: The floor of an attached garage shall be not less than 100 mm below the floor level of any adjacent dwelling unit

requirements.description: Attached garages shall be separated from dwelling units by a gas-tight construction
requirements.exact_quote: Attached garages shall be separated from dwelling units by a gas-tight construction

requirements.description: Minimum fire-resistance rating for separation between garage and dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: The separation between an attached garage and a dwelling unit shall have a fire-resistance rating of not less than 45 minutes

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of Type X gypsum board on garage side of separation wall
requirements.exact_quote: Walls separating an attached garage from a dwelling unit shall be finished on the garage side with not less than 12.7 mm Type X gypsum board

requirements.description: The gypsum board shall extend from the floor to the underside of the roof sheathing or ceiling assembly
requirements.exact_quote: The gypsum board shall extend from the floor to the underside of the roof sheathing or ceiling assembly

requirements.description: Minimum thickness of Type X gypsum board on ceiling below dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: Where a dwelling unit is located above a garage, the ceiling of the garage shall be finished with not less than 12.7 mm Type X gypsum board

requirements.description: Minimum fire protection rating for door between garage and dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: Doors between an attached garage and a dwelling unit shall have a fire protection rating of not less than 20 minutes

requirements.description: Doors between garage and dwelling unit shall be self-closing
requirements.exact_quote: Doors between an attached garage and a dwelling unit shall be self-closing

requirements.description: Doors between garage and dwelling unit shall be tight-fitting to prevent gas migration
requirements.exact_quote: Doors between an attached garage and a dwelling unit shall be tight-fitting to prevent gas migration

requirements.description: There shall be no door opening directly between an attached garage and a bedroom
requirements.exact_quote: There shall be no door opening directly between an attached garage and a bedroom

requirements.description: Penetrations through the separation between garage and dwelling unit shall be sealed to prevent gas migration
requirements.exact_quote: Penetrations through the separation between an attached garage and a dwelling unit shall be sealed to prevent gas migration

requirements.description: Heating and ventilation ductwork shall not connect a garage with a dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: Heating and ventilation ductwork shall not connect a garage with a dwelling unit unless the garage has mechanical exhaust ventilation

requirements.description: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be installed in dwelling units with attached garages
requirements.exact_quote: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be installed in dwelling units with attached garages

requirements.description: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be installed adjacent to each sleeping area in a dwelling unit with an attached garage
requirements.exact_quote: Carbon monoxide alarms shall be installed adjacent to each sleeping area in a dwelling unit with an attached garage

requirements.description: Carbon monoxide alarms shall conform to CAN/CSA 6.19
requirements.exact_quote: Carbon monoxide alarms shall conform to CAN/CSA 6.19

requirements.description: Minimum percentage of carport perimeter that shall be open
requirements.exact_quote: Carports shall have at least 40% of the perimeter open

requirements.description: Carports shall be separated from dwelling units by construction conforming to the requirements for attached garages unless at least 2 sides are completely open
requirements.exact_quote: Carports shall be separated from dwelling units by construction conforming to the requirements for attached garages unless at least 2 sides are completely open

requirements.description: Columns supporting carport roofs shall conform to Section 9.17
requirements.exact_quote: Columns supporting carport roofs shall conform to Section 9.17
